title.rendered: Christina Hendricks Wants to Be on Game of Thrones?!

content.rendered:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

Christina Hendricks already stars on one critically-acclaimed series but it seems the busty redheaded star of Mad Men may have her sights set on another popular franchise.

Christina appeared on Conan last night where she discussed a comment she’d earlier made to reporters about her desire to appear on Game of Thrones.

Christina admitted that she’s "never seen" the show and was "confused" when she tried to watch an episode from Season 2, but still gives the wildly popular series as her number one answer when asked what sort of show she’d like to try next.

Explaining her off-the-cuff remark about a show she’s never watched, Christina said, "I was just thinking of all those pelts and horns and wolves and horses or whatever they have," likely causing fanboy heads to explode across the country.

With Mad Men entering its final season, it’s no wonder Christina wants to get on board with a show so popular its premiere crashed HBO Go and of course her famously curvaceous figure would fit right in with GOT‘s sexually-charged atmosphere. 

 

But a word of advice for future reference, Christina: before you discuss a show with rabidly obsessive fan base, make sure you check out an episode or two first.

Don’t make the same mistake as Ms. Hendricks. Watch Game of Thrones online at TV Fanatic and check out some of the show’s most beloved characters as you’ve never seen them before in the gallery below. 

Game of Thrones Characters In Real Life

VIEW GALLERY
